drop_last.description:
If the number of samples is not divisible by the batch size,
whether to drop the last batch (the default) or pad the last batch with zeros.

max_network_retries.description: Optionally, the number of times to retry HTTP requests if they fail.

max_seq_length.description: Optionally, the ability to set a custom sequence length for the training dataset.

shuffle.description: Whether to shuffle the dataset for each epoch. Defaults to True.

synthetic_device.description: Device to store the sample pool. Should be `cuda` or `cpu`. Defauls to `cpu`.

synthetic_memory_format.description: Memory format. Defaults to contiguous format.

synthetic_num_unique_samples.description: The number of unique samples to allocate memory for.

task.description: The GLUE task to train on, choose one from: CoLA, MNLI, MRPC, QNLI, QQP, RTE, SST-2, and STS-B.

tokenizer_name.description: The name of the HuggingFace tokenizer to preprocess text with.

use_synthetic.description: Whether to use synthetic data. Defaults to False.
